item.title: Levi Strauss May Be a Super Buying Opportunity After the Earnings Dip
item.description: LEVI stock fell after lighter guidance, but technical signals, brand momentum, and business transformation suggest a potential buying opportunity

item.title: Insiders Rang in the New Year Selling These Stocks, Buyers Beware
item.description: Insiders sold stock in high-flying names like CoreWeave and Urban Outfitters in January, limiting upside potential in H1 2026.

item.title: BlackRock Files for a Bitcoin Income ETF That Sells Options for Yield
item.description: As fixed income yields fall, BlackRock’s new iShares Bitcoin Premium Income ETF will use covered calls to Bitcoin into yield for income investors.
